definition: exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)
earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: When digging a hole for planting, one should put topsoil and subsoil in two different sides of the hole.
sentences.chinese: 挖栽植坑时，应将表土和底土分别放在坑的两侧。

sentences.english: Drainage and quality topsoil are essential to growth of the fine turf.
sentences.chinese: 排水和表土对将来草坪的生长非常重要。

sentences.english: Solar arrays are set up on the regolith that covers the Moon’s surface.
sentences.chinese: 太阳能电池方阵覆盖着月球表土。

sentences.english: Surface pollen may be a part of the alluvium pollen.
sentences.chinese: 表土花粉可能成为冲积物花粉的一部分。

sentences.english: Every contour that can be left alone saves topsoil stripping and replacement.
sentences.chinese: 凡是可以保留的区域都不需要表土收集和替换。

sentences.english: Topsoil excavated from the work site shall be applied onto the gabions .
sentences.chinese: 从工地挖出的表土须用于筑堤的石笼上。

sentences.english: This also prevents contamination of the nonorganic material which is below the topsoil and which may be required for fill.
sentences.chinese: 土方发掘也利于防止表土下非有机材料的污染或换填。

sentences.english: Plant the dry bulbs just below the surface.
sentences.chinese: 种植时只消把干鳞茎埋入表土即可。

sentences.english: Erosion has dissolved acres of topsoil.
sentences.chinese: 侵蚀作用已使大量表土层流失。

sentences.english: Loess is easy borne by the wind and may be carried long distances before it falls to earth and becomes topsoil.
sentences.chinese: 黄土易被风刮起并带至远处方才落下成为表土层。

sentences.english: The agriculture ministry now says removing that contaminated topsoil may be effective.
sentences.chinese: 农业省现在表示去除受污的表土可能有效。

definition: to sprout/to come out (of seedling)/to bud
